## Loading libraries

::: callout-note
`include: false` is used to avoid displaying the code chunk in the final document.
:::

```{r}
#| label: setup
#| include: false

library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Loading labbook

```{r}
#| label: load-lb

lb <- read_tsv("data/labbook_aurelien_2024.tsv",
               show_col_types = FALSE)
```

```{r}
#| label: tbl-gino-2024
#| tbl-cap: 2024 top projects A. Ginolhac

count(lb, Project, sort = TRUE) |> 
  filter(n > 10) |> 
  knitr::kable()
```

## Barplot for 190601

Sergio Helgueta Romero PhD and follow-up

```{r}
#| label: sergio-barplot
#| fig-cap: 190601 Project daily actions

lb |> 
  filter(Project == "190601") |> 
  mutate(start = lubridate::ymd(Date)) |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = start)) +
  geom_bar() +
  theme_bw(14)
```
